languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно прикасается к голове мертвеца, охватывает клешнями нейроаугмент и со всей возможной осторожностью извлекает его из гнезда. Кость черепа сухо трещит, мозговое вещество марает священный металл.{/n} "Упокойся аннулированным, технобрат. Знание, что ты снискал в своих трудах, будет сбережено и очищено".

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно прикасается к голове мертвеца, охватывает клешнями нейроаугмент и со всей возможной осторожностью извлекает его из гнезда. Кость черепа сухо трещит, мозговое вещество марает священный металл.{/n} "Упокойся аннулированным, технобрат. Знание, что ты снискал в своих трудах, будет сбережено и очищено".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."
languages.original_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Мехадендрит{/g} Паскаля осторожно прикасается к голове мертвеца, охватывает клешнями нейроаугмент и со всей возможной осторожностью извлекает его из гнезда. Кость черепа сухо трещит, мозговое вещество марает священный металл.{/n} "Упокойся очищенным, технобрат. Знание, что ты снискал в своих трудах, будет сбережено и очищено".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The bones of the skull crack dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

languages.text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} berührt vorsichtig die Hand des Toten, packt mit seiner Klaue die neurale Augmentation und zieht sie mit größter Sorgfalt aus dem Sockel. Der Schädelknochen zerbricht mit einem trockenen Geräusch, und Gehirnmasse entweiht das heilige Metall.{/n} "Ruhet in Reinheit, Tech-Bruder. Das Wissen, das Ihr durch Eure Bemühungen erlangt habt, wird bewahrt und bereinigt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendrit{/g} berührt vorsichtig die Hand des Toten, packt mit seiner Klaue die neurale Augmentation und zieht sie mit größter Sorgfalt aus dem Sockel. Der Schädelknochen zerbricht mit einem trockenen Geräusch, und Gehirnmasse entweiht das heilige Metall.{/n} "Ruhet in Reinheit, Tech-Bruder. Das Wissen, das Ihr durch Eure Bemühungen erlangt habt, wird bewahrt und bereinigt werden."

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} de Pasqal touche le front du cadavre et saisit son augmétique neural avant de l'extraire de son emplacement avec des précautions extrêmes. Les os du crâne émettent des craquements secs et la cervelle entache le métal sacré.{/n} « Repose en paix, ô technofrère. La Connaissance que tu as atteinte par tes efforts sera conservée et purifiée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} de Pasqal touche le front du cadavre et saisit son augmétique neural avant de l'extraire de son emplacement avec des précautions extrêmes. Les os du crâne émettent des craquements secs et la cervelle entache le métal sacré.{/n} « Repose en paix, ô technofrère. La Connaissance que tu as atteinte par tes efforts sera conservée et purifiée. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡挥舞着{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}，小心翼翼地碰了碰死者的头，之后用机械爪抓住他的神经植入物，极其谨慎地把它从颅内取出。死者的头骨发出破裂的脆响，脑浆浸染在了神圣的金属上。{/n}“在纯洁中安息吧，技术兄弟。你努力获得的知识将得到保存、净化。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡挥舞着{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}，小心翼翼地碰了碰死者的头，之后用机械爪抓住他的神经植入物，极其谨慎地把它从颅内取出。死者的头骨发出破裂的脆响，脑浆浸染在了神圣的金属上。{/n}“在纯洁中安息吧，技术兄弟。你努力获得的知识将得到保存、净化。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}が男の死体の頭にそっと触れ、その爪で神経オーグメティックをつかみ、丁寧に眼窩から取り外した。頭蓋骨は乾燥でヒビが入っており、脳から出た物が神聖なる金属を汚す。{/n}「ピュリティの中で眠りたまえ、技術同志。その努力で手に入れた知識は、保存され浄化される」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}が男の死体の頭にそっと触れ、その爪で神経オーグメティックをつかみ、丁寧に眼窩から取り外した。頭蓋骨には乾燥でヒビが入り、脳から出た物が神聖なる金属を汚す。{/n}「清らかに休みたまえ、技術の同志。あなたの努力で手に入れた知識は、保存と浄化がなされる」

languages.text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} de Pasqal toca con cuidado la cabeza del muerto, agarra su aumético neural con su garra y lo extrae de su cavidad con sumo cuidado. El hueso del cráneo cruje estrepitosamente y la masa encefálica mancha el metal sagrado.{/n} «Descansa en la pureza, tecnohermano. El Conocimiento que has alcanzado con tu esfuerzo será preservado y purificado».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}La {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} de Pasqal toca con cuidado la cabeza del muerto, agarra su aumético neural con su garra y lo extrae de su cavidad con sumo cuidado. El hueso del cráneo cruje estrepitosamente y la masa encefálica mancha el metal sagrado.{/n} «Descansa en la pureza, tecnohermano. El Conocimiento que has alcanzado con tu esfuerzo será preservado y purificado».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentriti{/g}, ölü adamın başına usulca dokunuyor, sinirsel ogmetiğini pençesi arasına alıyor ve azami özenle yuvasından çekip çıkarıyor. Kafatasından tok bir çatırtı geliyor ve beyninin parçaları, kutsal metale saçılıyor.{/n} "Saflık içinde uyu tekno kardeşim. Gayretlerinle edindiğin İrfan, muhafaza edilip arındırılacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g} touches the dead man's head carefully, grips his neural augmetic in its claw, and extracts it from its socket with the utmost care. The skull bone cracks dryly, and brain matter taints the sacred metal.{/n} "Rest in purity, tech-brother. The Knowledge you have attained through your efforts will be preserved and purified."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}i, usulca ölü adamın başına dokunuyor, sinirsel ogmetiğini pençeleri arasına alıyor ve azami özenle yuvasından çekip çıkarıyor. Kafatası çatırdıyor ve beyninin parçaları, kutsal metale saçılıyor.{/n} "Saflık içinde uyu tekno kardeş. Gayretlerinle edindiğin İrfan, arındırılıp korunacak."
